explains: adv. 小心翼翼地；慎重地
adj. 谨慎的；轻手轻脚的；慎重的

sentences.en: Gingerly, she put her hand in deeper, to the bottom.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地把手伸得更深，直到底部。

sentences.en: She was touching the dressing gingerly with both hands.
sentences.cn: 她用双手小心翼翼地触摸着敷药。

sentences.en: He held up his forepaw as the Mole stepped gingerly down.
sentences.cn: 鼹鼠小心翼翼地走下来的时候，他举起了前爪。
